overview: Visualised machine instructions make up their own semantics and are base for human instructions. On a cinema screen these images are detached from their initial meaning.They condense on the picture base and swash into our eyes. Like a random rhizome structure an associative montage of minimalistic user interfaces follows the film's timeline. Our own body perception and our interpretation formed by media conditions become protagonists in a film without narrative.
title: Liquid Traits of an Image Apparatus
